questions.question: Which is HTML-like Syntax commonly used in React Applications?
Why do component names have to start with Capital letter?
multipleChoiceAnswers: To avoid confusion with regular HTML elements

questions.question: What's the name of the object we use to pass down data from parent to children?
What is the purpose of interpolation brackets?
multipleChoiceAnswers: To execute bits of JavaScript within JSX

questions.question: What does setState function do?
multipleChoiceAnswers: Merges existing state with the new state
